text:
{"fixed_xml":"<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <ADVERTISING_ENTRY>
        <PUBLISHER>Bey Herrn Hans Jacob Bischoff, Buchhändlern allhier</PUBLISHER>
        <SUBSCRIPTION_ACCEPTANCE>
            <WORK>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Pour le Dictionaire Universel de Medecine, de Physique, de Chymie, de Botanique, de Chirurgie, d'Anatomie, de Pharmacie &c.</TITLE>
                    <VOLUME>six Volumes</VOLUME>
                    <FORMAT>Folio</FORMAT>
                    <FIGURES>avec Figures</FIGURES>
                    <TRANSLATION>traduit de l'Anglois</TRANSLATION>
                    <AUTHOR>Mr. James, Docteur en Medecine</AUTHOR>
                    <PRIZE>
                        <AMOUNT>100. Pfund</AMOUNT>
                        <CURRENCY>Frantzös.</CURRENCY>
                        <VALUTA>Valuta</VALUTA>
                    </PRIZE>
                    <SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD>
                        <END_DATE>Ende Februarii</END_DATE>
                    </SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD>
                </BIBL>
            </WORK>
        </SUBSCRIPTION_ACCEPTANCE>
        <WORK>
            <BIBL>
                <TITLE>Histoire generale des Voyages, ou Nouvelle Collection de toutes les Relations de Voyages par Mer & par Terre, qusont Ete publiee jusqua present dans les differentes Langues de toutes les Nations connues, &c.</TITLE>
                <VOLUME>dix Vol.</VOLUME>
                <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
                <FIGURES>avec Fig.</FIGURES>
                <PUBLICATION_DETAILS>
                    <COUNTRY>publie en Angleterre</COUNTRY>
                    <PRIVILEGE>avec un Privilege special du Roy & du Parlement</PRIVILEGE>
                    <TRANSLATION>traduit en Francois par POrdre de Monsgr. le Chancelier de France</TRANSLATION>
                </PUBLICATION_DETAILS>
                <PRIZE>
                    <DISCOUNT>
                        <AMOUNT>12 Pfund</AMOUNT>
                        <CONDITION>Jeder Theil auf ord. Papier wird denen Herren Praenumeranten vor</CONDITION>
                    </DISCOUNT>
                    <AMOUNT_DUE>
                        <AMOUNT>18. Pfund</AMOUNT>
                        <CONDITION>zahlen dieselben gleich dato zum voraus</CONDITION>
                    </AMOUNT_DUE>
                </PRIZE>
                <SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD>
                    <END_DATE>Primo Martii</END_DATE>
                </SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD>
                <DELIVERY>
                    <DATE>mediosprilis</DATE>
                    <ITEM>der erste Tomus ausgeliefert</ITEM>
                </DELIVERY>
            </BIBL>
        </WORK>
        <WORK>
            <BIBL>
                <TITLE>l'Année Chretienne, contenant les Messes des Dimanches & des Fetes de toute l'Année, en Latin & en Français, avec l'Explication des Epitres & des Evangiles, & les Messes votives de toute l'Année</TITLE>
                <AUTHOR>Mons. Le Tourneux</AUTHOR>
                <VOLUME>12. XIII. Vol.</VOLUME>
                <PRICE>
                    <TOTAL>30. Pfund</TOTAL>
                    <ADVANCE>
                        <AMOUNT>15. Pfund</AMOUNT>
                        <CONDITION>davon gleich dato</CONDITION>
                    </ADVANCE>
                    <REMAINING>
                        <AMOUNT>15. Pfund</AMOUNT>
                        <CONDITION>im Monat Junio bezahlt</CONDITION>
                    </REMAINING>
                </PRICE>
                <SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD>
                    <END_DATE>primo Aprilis</END_DATE>
                </SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD>
                <ADDITIONAL_INFO>
                    <ITEM>Die Projecte sind in obigem Buchladen zu sehen</ITEM>
                    <ITEM>allwo auch der nähere Bericht zu vernehmen ist</ITEM>
                </ADDITIONAL_INFO>
            </BIBL>
        </WORK>
    </ADVERTISING_ENTRY>
</ITEM>","number_of_corrections":20,"explanation":"The following corrections and additions were made to the XML:
1. Added XML declaration.
2. Fixed malformed characters (e.g., 'ü', 'ß', 'a', '0', 'u', 'c', 'e', 'n') to their correct Unicode equivalents.
3. Corrected malformed tags (e.g., <PRICE> to <PRIZE>, <PRICE> to <AMOUNT>, <PRICE> to <TOTAL>, etc.).
4. Added missing tags for logical grouping (e.g., <ADVERTISING_ENTRY>, <WORK>, <PUBLISHER>, <SUBSCRIPTION_ACCEPTANCE>, <PUBLICATION_DETAILS>, <DELIVERY>, <ADDITIONAL_INFO>).
5. Structured pricing information into nested tags for clarity (e.g., <PRIZE> with <AMOUNT> and <CURRENCY>).
6. Added <FIGURES> tag for works mentioning figures.
7. Added <TRANSLATION> tag for translation details.
8. Added <DISCOUNT> and <AMOUNT_DUE> tags for subscription pricing details.
9. Added <ADVANCE> and <REMAINING> tags for payment details.
10. Corrected and added <SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD> tags for subscription end dates.
11. Added <DELIVERY> tag for delivery information.
12. Corrected and added <CONDITION> tags for additional conditions.
13. Fixed and standardized volume and format tags.
14. Added <PUBLICATION_DETAILS> tag for publication specifics.
15. Fixed and added <ITEM> tags for additional information.
16. Corrected and added <COUNTRY> tag for publication country.
17. Corrected and added <PRIVILEGE> tag for special privileges.
18. Fixed and added <CURRENCY> tag for currency information.
19. Fixed and added <VALUTA> tag for valuation information.
20. Ensured all tags are properly nested and closed."}

parsed.fixed_xml:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<ITEM>
    <ADVERTISING_ENTRY>
        <PUBLISHER>Bey Herrn Hans Jacob Bischoff, Buchhändlern allhier</PUBLISHER>
        <SUBSCRIPTION_ACCEPTANCE>
            <WORK>
                <BIBL>
                    <TITLE>Pour le Dictionaire Universel de Medecine, de Physique, de Chymie, de Botanique, de Chirurgie, d'Anatomie, de Pharmacie &c.</TITLE>
                    <VOLUME>six Volumes</VOLUME>
                    <FORMAT>Folio</FORMAT>
                    <FIGURES>avec Figures</FIGURES>
                    <TRANSLATION>traduit de l'Anglois</TRANSLATION>
                    <AUTHOR>Mr. James, Docteur en Medecine</AUTHOR>
                    <PRIZE>
                        <AMOUNT>100. Pfund</AMOUNT>
                        <CURRENCY>Frantzös.</CURRENCY>
                        <VALUTA>Valuta</VALUTA>
                    </PRIZE>
                    <SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD>
                        <END_DATE>Ende Februarii</END_DATE>
                    </SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD>
                </BIBL>
            </WORK>
        </SUBSCRIPTION_ACCEPTANCE>
        <WORK>
            <BIBL>
                <TITLE>Histoire generale des Voyages, ou Nouvelle Collection de toutes les Relations de Voyages par Mer & par Terre, qusont Ete publiee jusqua present dans les differentes Langues de toutes les Nations connues, &c.</TITLE>
                <VOLUME>dix Vol.</VOLUME>
                <FORMAT>4to.</FORMAT>
                <FIGURES>avec Fig.</FIGURES>
                <PUBLICATION_DETAILS>
                    <COUNTRY>publie en Angleterre</COUNTRY>
                    <PRIVILEGE>avec un Privilege special du Roy & du Parlement</PRIVILEGE>
                    <TRANSLATION>traduit en Francois par POrdre de Monsgr. le Chancelier de France</TRANSLATION>
                </PUBLICATION_DETAILS>
                <PRIZE>
                    <DISCOUNT>
                        <AMOUNT>12 Pfund</AMOUNT>
                        <CONDITION>Jeder Theil auf ord. Papier wird denen Herren Praenumeranten vor</CONDITION>
                    </DISCOUNT>
                    <AMOUNT_DUE>
                        <AMOUNT>18. Pfund</AMOUNT>
                        <CONDITION>zahlen dieselben gleich dato zum voraus</CONDITION>
                    </AMOUNT_DUE>
                </PRIZE>
                <SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD>
                    <END_DATE>Primo Martii</END_DATE>
                </SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD>
                <DELIVERY>
                    <DATE>mediosprilis</DATE>
                    <ITEM>der erste Tomus ausgeliefert</ITEM>
                </DELIVERY>
            </BIBL>
        </WORK>
        <WORK>
            <BIBL>
                <TITLE>l'Année Chretienne, contenant les Messes des Dimanches & des Fetes de toute l'Année, en Latin & en Français, avec l'Explication des Epitres & des Evangiles, & les Messes votives de toute l'Année</TITLE>
                <AUTHOR>Mons. Le Tourneux</AUTHOR>
                <VOLUME>12. XIII. Vol.</VOLUME>
                <PRICE>
                    <TOTAL>30. Pfund</TOTAL>
                    <ADVANCE>
                        <AMOUNT>15. Pfund</AMOUNT>
                        <CONDITION>davon gleich dato</CONDITION>
                    </ADVANCE>
                    <REMAINING>
                        <AMOUNT>15. Pfund</AMOUNT>
                        <CONDITION>im Monat Junio bezahlt</CONDITION>
                    </REMAINING>
                </PRICE>
                <SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD>
                    <END_DATE>primo Aprilis</END_DATE>
                </SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD>
                <ADDITIONAL_INFO>
                    <ITEM>Die Projecte sind in obigem Buchladen zu sehen</ITEM>
                    <ITEM>allwo auch der nähere Bericht zu vernehmen ist</ITEM>
                </ADDITIONAL_INFO>
            </BIBL>
        </WORK>
    </ADVERTISING_ENTRY>
</ITEM>
parsed.explanation:
The following corrections and additions were made to the XML:
1. Added XML declaration.
2. Fixed malformed characters (e.g., 'ü', 'ß', 'a', '0', 'u', 'c', 'e', 'n') to their correct Unicode equivalents.
3. Corrected malformed tags (e.g., <PRICE> to <PRIZE>, <PRICE> to <AMOUNT>, <PRICE> to <TOTAL>, etc.).
4. Added missing tags for logical grouping (e.g., <ADVERTISING_ENTRY>, <WORK>, <PUBLISHER>, <SUBSCRIPTION_ACCEPTANCE>, <PUBLICATION_DETAILS>, <DELIVERY>, <ADDITIONAL_INFO>).
5. Structured pricing information into nested tags for clarity (e.g., <PRIZE> with <AMOUNT> and <CURRENCY>).
6. Added <FIGURES> tag for works mentioning figures.
7. Added <TRANSLATION> tag for translation details.
8. Added <DISCOUNT> and <AMOUNT_DUE> tags for subscription pricing details.
9. Added <ADVANCE> and <REMAINING> tags for payment details.
10. Corrected and added <SUBSCRIPTION_PERIOD> tags for subscription end dates.
11. Added <DELIVERY> tag for delivery information.
12. Corrected and added <CONDITION> tags for additional conditions.
13. Fixed and standardized volume and format tags.
14. Added <PUBLICATION_DETAILS> tag for publication specifics.
15. Fixed and added <ITEM> tags for additional information.
16. Corrected and added <COUNTRY> tag for publication country.
17. Corrected and added <PRIVILEGE> tag for special privileges.
18. Fixed and added <CURRENCY> tag for currency information.
19. Fixed and added <VALUTA> tag for valuation information.
20. Ensured all tags are properly nested and closed.
